rule: Each description must first focus on identifying the subjects, including their specific characteristics such as appearance, attire, and actions.
input: An elderly man wearing a vintage hat and coat, sitting thoughtfully on a park bench, feeding pigeons as the sun sets behind him.
coverage: An elderly man in a vintage hat and coat sits thoughtfully on a park bench, feeding a flock of pigeons. As the sun sets behind him, warm golden light illuminates the lush trees and tranquil park environment. The soft twilight creates a serene and nostalgic atmosphere, evoking feelings of peaceful reflection and timelessness.
